title: Option to include notes (v1.0) in exportfile

labels.name: front-end
labels.description: Issues related to front-end, UX and UI

body:
As discussed on the users meeting on Friday July, 1, I would like the option to export the notes (from version 1.0). 
I understand the difficulty in creating an exportfile with notes, because it could be manipulated and therefore not be suitable for import. Perhaps it is possible to adress this while choosing the type of exportfile. E.g. you can choose to export a file with notes, but you get a reminder that this file is not suitable for import and that if you want a file suitable for import, you should choose option x.  

Unfortunately, I cannot develop it myself, but I would be happy to contribute to the development from a users end. 

## Feature Request

**Is your feature request related to a problem? Please describe.**
A clear and concise description of what the problem is. Ex. I have an issue when [...]

**Describe the solution you'd like**
A clear and concise description of what you want to happen. Add any considered drawbacks.

**Describe alternatives you've considered**
A clear and concise description of any alternative solutions or features you've considered.

**Teachability, Documentation, Adoption, Migration Strategy**
A clear explanation of how your new feature can be used by users.
Maybe with screenshot or design?
